original_text: After they left the meeting room, they said to each other, ‘This man has not done anything bad. We should not kill him, or even hold him in prison.’
korean_text: 물러가 서로 말하되 이 사람은 사형이나 결박을 당할 만한 행위가 없다 하더라

sentences.original_text: After they left the meeting room
This man has not done anything bad
sentences.korean_translation: 이 사람은 아무 나쁜 일도 하지 않았다

sentences.original_text: or even hold him in prison
sentences.korean_translation: 심지어 그를 감옥에 가두지도 말아야 한다
